_A_MODAL_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: AModal is a component that enables the implementation of modal windows. It provides a multitude of customization options, including various parameters for content, button behavior, visibility controls, and size adjustments. With customizable slots for header, body, and footer, it allows for flexible styling of modal windows for various use cases.
_A_MODAL_GROUP_BODY_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: The body-html prop is used to display custom HTML content in the modal window.
_A_MODAL_GROUP_CLOSE_BUTTON_DESCRIPTION_:
This example demonstrates various options for customizing the close button.

Here, the props close-button-attributes, close-button-class, close-button-id, and close-button-text are used to customize the close button. The close button is given a custom text tag, custom classes, and a custom ID, and the button text is loaded from a translation file.
_A_MODAL_GROUP_SAVE_BUTTON_DESCRIPTION_:
This example demonstrates various options for customizing the save button.

Here, the props save, save-button-attributes, save-button-class, and save-button-id are used to customize the save button. The save button is given a custom text tag, custom classes, and a custom ID.
_A_MODAL_GROUP_SELECTOR_CLOSE_DESCRIPTIO:
This example demonstrates the use of selector-close to set focus on specific elements after closing the modal.

Focus is set to the elements with IDs 'btn_aloha' and 'btn_open_modal' after closing the modal. This helps to maintain focus in the browser.
_A_MODAL_GROUP_SELECTOR_CLOSE_IDS_DESCRI:
This example demonstrates the use of selector-close-ids to set focus on specific elements with IDs after closing the modal.

Focus is set to the elements with IDs 'btn_aloha' and 'btn_open_modal_id' after closing the modal. This helps to maintain focus in the browser.
_A_MODAL_GROUP_SIZE_DESCRIPTION_:
This example demonstrates the use of the size prop to adjust the size of the modal as needed.

The modal size is based on options such as 'small', 'large', 'xl', 'xxl', and 'fullscreen'.
_A_MODAL_GROUP_SIZE_HEADER_: Using the size prop to control modal size
_A_MODAL_GROUP_SLOTS_DESCRIPTION_: This example demonstrates the use of various slots for customizing the content in the modal.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_BACKDROP_Z_INDEX_DESCRIPT: If set, this prop specifies the CSS z-index for the modal window's backdrop.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_BODY_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: The HTML content of the modal window.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_CLOSE_BUTTON_ATTRIBUTES_D: Attributes for the modal's close button. (AButton)
_A_MODAL_PROPS_CLOSE_BUTTON_CLASS_DESCRI: The class or classes of the close button. (AButton)
_A_MODAL_PROPS_CLOSE_BUTTON_ID_DESCRIPTI: The ID of the close button.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_CLOSE_BUTTON_TEXT_DESCRIP: The text on the close button.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_CLOSE_DESCRIPTION_: The function that enables closing the modal.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_DISABLED_DESCRIPTION_: Specifies whether the modal is disabled.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_DISABLED_SAVE_DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the save button in the modal is disabled.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_EXTRA_DESCRIPTION_: An object with parameters for translations. (ATranslation)
_A_MODAL_PROPS_HEADER_TAG_DESCRIPTION_: The HTML tag for the modal header.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_HEADER_TEXT_DESCRIPTION_: The text in the modal header.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_HIDE_FOOTER_DESCRIPTION_: Specifies whether to hide the footer in the modal window.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_IS_CLOSE_BUTTON_HIDE_DESC: Determines whether the close button is visible.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_IS_CONFIRM_DESCRIPTION_: Specifies whether the modal requires confirmation. (Only for AConfirm)
_A_MODAL_PROPS_IS_MODAL_HIDDEN_DESCRIPTI: Determines whether the modal is hidden. (Only for AConfirm)
_A_MODAL_PROPS_IS_SAVE_BUTTON_HIDE_DESCR: Determines whether the save button is visible.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_LOADING_DESCRIPTION_: Specifies whether the modal is in a loading state.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_MODAL_CLASS_DESCRIPTION_: The class or classes of the modal.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_SAVE_BUTTON_ATTRIBUTES_DE: Attributes for the save button in the modal. (AButton)
_A_MODAL_PROPS_SAVE_BUTTON_CLASS_DESCRIP: The class or classes of the save button. (AButton)
_A_MODAL_PROPS_SAVE_BUTTON_ID_DESCRIPTIO: The ID of the save button.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_SAVE_BUTTON_TEXT_DESCRIPT: The text on the save button.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_SAVE_DESCRIPTION_: The function that enables saving in the modal.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_SELECTOR_CLOSE_DESCRIPTIO: The focus selector to ensure that focus is not lost in the browser when the modal is closed.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_SELECTOR_CLOSE_IDS_DESCRI: The ID or IDs for focus to ensure that focus is not lost in the browser when the modal is closed.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_SHOW_CLOSE_BUTTON_DESCRIP: Determines whether to display the close button ("x") in the header of the modal window.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_SIZE_DESCRIPTION_: The size of the modal (small, large, xl, xxl, fullscreen).
_A_MODAL_PROPS_STOP_DESCRIPTION_: Adds a click event with stopPropagation to the modal window's parent element to prevent the event from propagating further.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_USE_ESCAPE_DESCRIPTION_: Specifies whether the Escape key can close the modal.
_A_MODAL_PROPS_Z_INDEX_DESCRIPTION_: Specifies the CSS z-index for the modal window itself.
_A_MODAL_SLOTS_MODAL_BODY_DESCRIPTION_: A slot containing the main content of the modal window.
_A_MODAL_SLOTS_MODAL_FOOTER_APPEND_DESCR: A slot displayed after the save and close buttons in the modal footer.
_A_MODAL_SLOTS_MODAL_FOOTER_PREPEND_DESC: A slot displayed before the save and close buttons in the modal footer.
_A_MODAL_SLOTS_MODAL_HEADER_DESCRIPTION_: A slot containing the content of the modal header.
